itunes:title: Drinkin Bros Fake News #85 - The Free Market is a Lie
title: Drinkin Bros Fake News #85 - The Free Market is a Lie
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the r/WallStreetBets campaign to drive up GameStop and AMC stock prices in order to fight back against Wall Street as well as hedge funds changing the rules of the game in order to save the billionaires they wor...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the r/WallStreetBets campaign to drive up GameStop and AMC stock prices in order to fight back against Wall Street as well as hedge funds changing the rules of the game in order to save the billionaires they work for. Dan compares shutting down people for trading in ways the establishment doesn’t like to shutting down social media accounts for speaking in ways the establishment doesn’t like plus Ross reads an insider report from Robinhood about who is working to stop the trades — plus swearing is a sign of intelligence and how much can we trust federal law enforcement?
